translations: 畏缩（cringed 是 cringe 的过去式）
感到难堪（cringed 是 cringe 的过去式）
卑躬屈膝（cringed 是 cringe 的过去式）

sentences.sentence: Molly had cringed when Ann started picking up the guitar.
sentences.translation: 安伸手去拿吉他时，莫利感到局促不安。

sentences.sentence: Chris had cringed at the thought of using her own family for publicity.
sentences.translation: 克里斯一想到要利用家人做宣传就感到局促不安。
